Method.name: projectExport
Method.Description: Export project with clear breakpoints, watchpoints, target and so on
Method.Implementation:
s prj = ##class(%Studio.Project).%OpenId( prjname, , .sc) Q:'sc sc
/// clear before export s prj.Target = "" s prj.TargetType = "" d prj.BreakPoints.Clear() d prj.WatchPoints.Clear() d prj.WatchVariables.Clear()
s filename = ##class(sc.options).workdir() _"\" _$tr(prjname,"_",".")_".PRJ.xml" w !,"** " _ filename s path = ##class(%File).GetDirectory( filename ) s sc = ##class(%File).CreateDirectoryChain( path ) Q:'sc sc
Q prj.Export( filename, "-d/diffexport" )
